description: Detects suspicious command line activity on Windows systems Author: Florian Roth, omkar72. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Reconnaissance Activity
query: process.command_line:("net\ group\ \"domain\ admins\"\ \/dom" OR "net\ localgroup\ administrators" OR "net\ group\ \"enterprise\ admins\"\ \/dom" OR "net\ accounts\ \/dom")
